segment.source: Assessments
segment.target: Assessments

segment.source: Assessments
segment.target: Assessments

segment.source: Assessments
segment.target: Assessments

segment.source: Assessments are a combination of .xml and binary files that induce a specific set of states on a computer, measure and record the activity, and preserve the recorded results.
segment.target: Assessments are a combination of .xml and binary files that induce a specific set of states on a computer, measure and record the activity, and preserve the recorded results.

segment.source: The results provide metrics and sometimes recommendations for resolving issues that the assessments found.
segment.target: The results provide metrics and sometimes recommendations for resolving issues that the assessments found.

segment.source: Assessments help you assess hardware or software that has been added to a computer.
segment.target: Assessments help you assess hardware or software that has been added to a computer.

segment.source: Assessments and the Windows Assessment Console are available as part of the Windows Assessment Toolkit that's available in the Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit (Windows ADK).
segment.target: Assessments and the Windows Assessment Console are available as part of the Windows Assessment Toolkit that's available in the Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit (Windows ADK).

segment.source: After you install the Windows Assessment Toolkit, you can use the Windows Assessment Console to create and run a job that includes one or more assessments.
segment.target: After you install the Windows Assessment Toolkit, you can use the Windows Assessment Console to create and run a job that includes one or more assessments.

segment.source: You can also package jobs to run them on computers that don't have the Windows Assessment Toolkit installed.
segment.target: You can also package jobs to run them on computers that don't have the Windows Assessment Toolkit installed.

segment.source: Assessments are also available when you install Windows Assessment Services and the Windows Assessment Services - Client (Windows ASC).
segment.target: Assessments are also available when you install Windows Assessment Services and the Windows Assessment Services - Client (Windows ASC).

segment.source: This diagram shows the general workflow for an assessment:
segment.target: This diagram shows the general workflow for an assessment:

segment.source: workflow graphic for assessments
segment.target: workflow graphic for assessments

segment.source: In This Section
segment.target: In This Section

segment.source: Connected Standby energy efficiency
segment.target: Connected Standby energy efficiency

segment.source: This assessment measures the impact of software and devices on the battery life of a system while it is in Connected Standby.
segment.target: This assessment measures the impact of software and devices on the battery life of a system while it is in Connected Standby.

segment.source: The assessment also measures the time spent transitioning into and out of Connected Standby.
segment.target: The assessment also measures the time spent transitioning into and out of Connected Standby.

segment.source: Driver Verification
segment.target: Driver Verification

segment.source: This assessment verifies that an offline Windows image or a running Windows operating system contains the correct set of drivers.
segment.target: This assessment verifies that an offline Windows image or a running Windows operating system contains the correct set of drivers.

segment.source: Edge Security Software Impact
segment.target: Edge Security Software Impact

segment.source: This assessment measures aspects of Microsoft Edge that are typically impacted by antimalware.
segment.target: This assessment measures aspects of Microsoft Edge that are typically impacted by antimalware.

segment.source: The assessment measures the impact on the launch and navigate times of Microsoft Edge.
segment.target: The assessment measures the impact on the launch and navigate times of Microsoft Edge.

segment.source: File Handling
segment.target: File Handling

segment.source: This assessment simulates file operations like copying, moving, compressing, uncompressing, and deleting files.
segment.target: This assessment simulates file operations like copying, moving, compressing, uncompressing, and deleting files.

segment.source: It also measures duration and throughput to help you evaluate the computer's performance.
segment.target: It also measures duration and throughput to help you evaluate the computer's performance.

segment.source: Internet Explorer Startup Performance
segment.target: Internet Explorer Startup Performance

segment.source: This assessment measures the time to fully render a blank page in Internet Explorer.
segment.target: This assessment measures the time to fully render a blank page in Internet Explorer.

segment.source: This measurement includes the load time of the IExplore.exe process and the frame-creation and tab-creation intervals.
segment.target: This measurement includes the load time of the IExplore.exe process and the frame-creation and tab-creation intervals.

segment.source: It also measures the effect of all extensions, add-ins, and toolbars that are installed on the system.
segment.target: It also measures the effect of all extensions, add-ins, and toolbars that are installed on the system.

segment.source: It doesn't measure any network or browsing performance.
segment.target: It doesn't measure any network or browsing performance.

segment.source: Internet Explorer Security Software Impact
segment.target: Internet Explorer Security Software Impact

segment.source: This assessment measures aspects of Internet Explorer that are typically impacted by antimalware and other browser add-ins.
segment.target: This assessment measures aspects of Internet Explorer that are typically impacted by antimalware and other browser add-ins.

segment.source: Local Video Playback
segment.target: Local Video Playback

segment.source: This assessment measures the usage rate of a computer’s battery during full-screen local video playback.
segment.target: This assessment measures the usage rate of a computer’s battery during full-screen local video playback.

segment.source: Media Transcoding Performance
segment.target: Media Transcoding Performance

segment.source: This assessment measures the transcode duration and relative speed of changing a video file to a different format or bit rate.
segment.target: This assessment measures the transcode duration and relative speed of changing a video file to a different format or bit rate.

segment.source: Memory Footprint
segment.target: Memory Footprint

segment.source: This assessment creates a snapshot of memory use during a series of system boots.
segment.target: This assessment creates a snapshot of memory use during a series of system boots.

segment.source: It then helps you identify ways to improve performance and efficiency by optimizing memory use.
segment.target: It then helps you identify ways to improve performance and efficiency by optimizing memory use.

segment.source: You can also use this assessment to compare a baseline operating system image against an Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM) image.
segment.target: You can also use this assessment to compare a baseline operating system image against an Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM) image.

segment.source: Minifilter Diagnostics
segment.target: Minifilter Diagnostics

segment.source: Describes the minifilter diagnostic setting that's available in several assessments.
segment.target: Describes the minifilter diagnostic setting that's available in several assessments.

segment.source: You can use the minifilter diagnostic setting to measure the time that the computer spends in minifilter operations and identify minifilter drivers that are inefficient, using too much memory, or not working.
segment.target: You can use the minifilter diagnostic setting to measure the time that the computer spends in minifilter operations and identify minifilter drivers that are inefficient, using too much memory, or not working.

segment.source: On/Off Transition Performance
segment.target: On/Off Transition Performance

segment.source: Describes the system requirements, assessment settings, results, and issues that are associated with the Boot Performance (Fast Startup), Hibernate Performance, and Standby Performance assessments.
segment.target: Describes the system requirements, assessment settings, results, and issues that are associated with the Boot Performance (Fast Startup), Hibernate Performance, and Standby Performance assessments.

segment.source: These assessments measures the transition from various computer states.
segment.target: These assessments measures the transition from various computer states.

segment.source: Out of Box Experience
segment.target: Out of Box Experience

segment.source: This assessment measures the duration of key aspects of the first startup experience (OOBE) that are typically impacted by image customizations and software add-ons applied to the Windows retail image.
segment.target: This assessment measures the duration of key aspects of the first startup experience (OOBE) that are typically impacted by image customizations and software add-ons applied to the Windows retail image.

segment.source: The assessment measures the duration of First Logon as well as specific aspects such as Active Setup and Provisioned App Install.
segment.target: The assessment measures the duration of First Logon as well as specific aspects such as Active Setup and Provisioned App Install.

segment.source: Streaming Media Performance
segment.target: Streaming Media Performance

segment.source: This assessment streams media in Internet Explorer by using video content that ranges from low resolution to high resolution.
segment.target: This assessment streams media in Internet Explorer by using video content that ranges from low resolution to high resolution.

segment.source: It then evaluates video playback quality based on the number of glitches that it detects.
segment.target: It then evaluates video playback quality based on the number of glitches that it detects.

segment.source: Windows Media Player Performance and Quality
segment.target: Windows Media Player Performance and Quality

segment.source: This assessment evaluates the performance and quality of Windows Media® Player playback and is used in a set of multimedia battery-life assessments.
segment.target: This assessment evaluates the performance and quality of Windows Media® Player playback and is used in a set of multimedia battery-life assessments.

segment.source: Windows Store App Performance
segment.target: Windows Store App Performance

segment.source: This assessment can help you optimize your app for a better customer experience.
segment.target: This assessment can help you optimize your app for a better customer experience.

segment.source: Common In-Depth Analysis Issues
segment.target: Common In-Depth Analysis Issues

segment.source: Describes common in-depth analysis issues that you can view in the Windows Assessment Console and further analyze in Windows® Performance Analyzer (WPA).
segment.target: Describes common in-depth analysis issues that you can view in the Windows Assessment Console and further analyze in Windows® Performance Analyzer (WPA).

segment.source: Troubleshooting Assessments
segment.target: Troubleshooting Assessments

segment.source: Describes common problems that cause assessments to fail.
segment.target: Describes common problems that cause assessments to fail.
